Articles.Content:
A steampunk flag please!

In the center an old timey compass.

A cartoony rocket flying around that compass (like how a lot of flagshave like the half line around the planet to show where the rocket is coming from)

In the background instead of stars little gears. Black background for space.

If anyone can make this Ill be eternally grateful!

The compass is not exactly in the center but i needed some space for the outer planets:

Edited October 9, 2013 by MadHorse

The compass is not exactly in the center but i needed some space for the outer planets:

That's awesome thank you!

Could somebody resize this:

To be a flag?

And if you want to get a little cropping practice in there too, I'd love this:

To be made into a flag as well.

Thanks in advance!

Edited October 9, 2013 by Wait, Was That Important?

Tell me if I have to change anything.

Thanks, man!

Edited October 9, 2013 by Sylandro

Also, for the sake of restitution, here's a flag I made so you can fly this bizarre dolphin proudly over your historic landing sites.

And if there are any anons on the KSP forums, here's one for you guys you magnificent devils.

Requesting a flag that somehow points that everywhere kerbals go there will be nuclear residue (use your imagination it would be cool if it is funny). Text could be just ksp & some nuclear warning or whole new thing "Atomic (nuclear logo) - Space Industries"

I'm not sure if you still want a flag since i saw your new one in the other thread.

made one with a Simpsons reference

Thank you! it's perfect. (Sadly my paint skilzz effort goes to backup flag) Must say your flag made me laugh and that's the point.

I don't usually use this nuclear rocket but kerbals honored new flag so much they have to put good nuclear thing to use for fireworks. Special fireworks show starts 3:00(min).

Edited October 10, 2013 by TUFOM

Could somebody resize this:

To be a flag?

And if you want to get a little cropping practice in there too, I'd love this:

To be made into a flag as well.

Thanks in advance!

Im kinda looking for a flag for one specific craft in my fleet - Mission Minmus, newly dubbed Konami One.

Would it be possible to put the landed craft itself on a flag with the name Konami One as a caption? It doesn't have to be a replica of the picture, just the craft itself is fine. You can also simplify the craft if that's easier, as long as it has the general shape. Maybe with a curved Minmus surface under it :-).

Thanks in advance :-)

@TUFOM

That jackhammer in your video scares me.

Im kinda looking for a flag for one specific craft in my fleet - Mission Minmus, newly dubbed Konami One.

*picture*

Would it be possible to put the landed craft itself on a flag with the name Konami One as a caption? It doesn't have to be a replica of the picture, just the craft itself is fine. You can also simplify the craft if that's easier, as long as it has the general shape. Maybe with a curved Minmus surface under it :-).

Thanks in advance :-)

This picture is almost pure darkness. It would be much easier for us if you can post a closeup in daylight.

Oh, sorry. My bad. It was the only photographed landing i've made yet - mostly orbital manoeuvers for the time being. Only other shot i've got is one at launch.

Ill do a daytime landing sometime soon, then get back to you :-).

Sorry for the holdup

You can take the picture on the launchpad, that doesn't matter.

Just take care of the right angle to get a proper silouette.
Thank you very much! They're excellent!

Could somebody please make me this with a white 'cloth' back ground and the initials W.S.W? Be very grateful

http://josa.ro/en/logo.gif

EDIT: Link not embedded as the photo is far far too big

Could somebody please make me this with a white 'cloth' back ground and the initials W.S.W? Be very grateful

http://josa.ro/en/logo.gif

EDIT: Link not embedded as the photo is far far too big
That is absolutely spot on perfect. Thanks!
Here you go :-).

Thanks, that's much better.

Edited October 10, 2013 by MadHorse

Viewing all the flags made by all yous people, makes me kinda jealous. Fantastic work. I'm looking for a flag for myself though...

- Commander Fishstick shall be in the center of the flag. Backround removed, of course. Only Hat, Head, Body, Arms, and Flippers.

- Trivette and Walker (Left two characters, respectively.) Heads and hats only.

- Trivette and Walker are on either side of the commander, left tipped to ~11 o'clock, right tipped to ~1 o'clock. i.e. T-Cmdr-W or W-Cmdr-T (whichever looks the best)

- All must be wearing monocles

- All must be wearing top hats in addition to their normal hats. (i.e. top hat on top of their hat.)

I'd prefer to do it myself, but I'm no designer. And the work done in this thread is AMAZING.

Source Images:

Commander Fishstick:

Walker: Texas Ranger

Looks awesome :-). Thanks

Btw how are you making these? It seems to go at quite a fast pace.

Viewing all the flags made by all yous people, makes me kinda jealous. Fantastic work. I'm looking for a flag for myself though...

- Commander Fishstick shall be in the center of the flag. Backround removed, of course. Only Hat, Head, Body, Arms, and Flippers.

- Trivette and Walker (Left two characters, respectively.) Heads and hats only.

- Trivette and Walker are on either side of the commander, left tipped to ~11 o'clock, right tipped to ~1 o'clock. i.e. T-Cmdr-W or W-Cmdr-T (whichever looks the best)

- All must be wearing monocles

- All must be wearing top hats in addition to their normal hats. (i.e. top hat on top of their hat.)

That's indeed a "krazy" request. I love it!

Let's see if i made it like you had it in mind...

Hey, i have a request.

Can you make a flag with the spaceship in the center of the photo at the bottom of the post, no words, same blue and off-white posterized colors, but a bit better resolution, and It says in Italicized Impact font "Drekevak" and then larger, taking up the center of the photo the unitialiced numerals "X", "I", and "V", with all slightly transparent off-white and the I behind the ship, like a luminous glow.

mabye that's too complicated, i can draw a picture if you need it EDIT here is a mock up:

Ship i want in center:

Edited October 10, 2013 by zekes

That's indeed a "krazy" request. I love it!

Let's see if i made it like you had it in mind...

Very nice, but I can't see the cowboy hats

If the background flag was removed and replaced with something less busy, and the top hats were sitting on top of, instead of nested around the hats, it would be a winner.

Hi, I would like to request another flag. I was thinking of the flag of the Spanish Monarchy during the height of the Age of Exploration. What I was thinking was the famous Cross of Burgundy:

Also, could you make it with the wavy effect of the Minimalist/Default flags?

Looks awesome :-). Thanks

Btw how are you making these? It seems to go at quite a fast pace.

I'm using Photoshop. Simple designs can be done within a few minutes (resize etc.), other ones need more effort (up to 1h or so?).

Very nice, but I can't see the cowboy hats

If the background flag was removed and replaced with something less busy, and the top hats were sitting on top of, instead of nested around the hats, it would be a winner.

No problem, i will post an update in the evening (Central European Time).
